body.section:
Assume you performed all steps from Installation section and have Crank Codegen properly compiled, installed and deployed. Next step is to perform application startup.
Steps to make Crank Code Generator running:
Run the following command in command line: > ant runStandalone When all previous steps are performed correctly, you will see the main Crank Codegen window:
Note*: Please note that Ant script depends on M2_REPO and GROOVY_HOME environment variables (how to set up Maven2 and Groovy, check Installation section)
All UI elements of application above are covered in Overview section. Please read this section before starting using Crank Codegen
For successful database reversing, you have to choose a valid datasource for your database.
Note*: Please visit Details section, subsection "Datasources" for more details
Then, the database should be initialized with creation script, and corresponding user credentials should be given
Please, create a database with a user 'presto2@localhost' with the following SQL script:
http://code.google.com/p/krank/wiki/CreatingSampleDatabaseForCodegenCrank
Start Crank Codegen and check datasource entries, whether they are valid for your MySQL database:
Press "Reverse DB" and generate tables and classes hierarchy
Press "Generate Code" to generate artifacts from the given database
Follow Plugin Mode section for details
